code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Loader from"./Loader";import{Document,Page,pdfjs}from"react-pdf";import ControlPanel from"./ControlPanel";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";pdfjs.GlobalWorkerOptions.workerSrc=`//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/pdf.js/${pdfjs.version}/pdf.worker.js`;const PDFReader=()=>{const[scale,setScale]=useState(1.0);const[numPages,setNumPages]=useState(null);const[pageNumber,setPageNumber]=useState(1);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);function onDocumentLoadSuccess(_ref){let{numPages}=_ref;setNumPages(numPages);setIsLoading(false);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{isLoading:isLoading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"pdf-section",className:"d-flex flex-column align-items-center w-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ControlPanel,{scale:scale,setScale:setScale,numPages:numPages,pageNumber:pageNumber,setPageNumber:setPageNumber,file:"/assets/docs/jano.pdf"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Document,{file:"/assets/docs/jano.pdf",onLoadSuccess:onDocumentLoadSuccess,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Page,{pageNumber:pageNumber,scale:scale})})]})]});};export default PDFReader;
